description.english: Return home alive with an elevator for the first time

description.english: Kill an Other while you have less than 5% of your Health

displayName.french: Ne faites pas ça chez vous

description.english: Kill a Vengeful Thing with a melee weapon and survive the explosion
description.german: Töte einen Rachsüchtigen Unnatürlichen mit einer Nahkampfwaffe und überlebe die Explosion
description.french: Tuer une Chose vindicative avec une arme de mêlée et survivre à l'explosion

description.english: Return home alive after a match without dealing damage

description.brazilian: Volte para casa vivo após uma partida em que você não causou dano
